divs: sighting detailsi was walking the trail that runs through hendersonville, tn. when i noticed 4 glowing white lights hovering in the sky. after a few seconds, they began rotating slowly, almost fluid like, and then they picked up speed. the rotation was counter clockwise, for several minutes. after about 2-3 minutes, they lights\orbs morphed into just 2 larger lights, and then began rotation again. after a minute or so they began to almost "twinkle" and became 4 lights again. i didn't feel scared at all, i felt more curious and thrilled than anything. i'm a skeptic, and i immediately ran back to my house, grabbed my keys and got in my car to go find the location of the lights. once i got to my car, they disappeared. as i was driving down new shackle island, i saw the same light, only this time it was darting extremely fast, faster than any plane i'd ever seen, across the sky. this was all taking place northeast.
